quote: Note that this journey is uniquely yours, no one elses. So the path has to be your own. – Jon Kabat-Zinn
fact: This common everyday occurrence composed of 59% nitrogen, 21% hydrogen, and 9% dioxide is called a `fart`.
joke: A red and a blue ship have just collided in the Caribbean. Apparently the survivors are marooned.
